precondition: User is at the desktop with no applications open.
action: Right-click on the desktop and select 'Properties' from the context menu.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
action: Select the 'Themes' tab and choose a theme from the dropdown menu.
expected_results: The selected theme is previewed in the dialog box.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open on the 'Themes' tab.
action: Click 'Apply' or 'OK' to apply the selected theme.
expected_results: The desktop appearance changes to reflect the selected theme.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab content is displayed.

action: Select a screen saver from the dropdown menu.
expected_results: The selected screen saver is previewed in the dialog box.

action: Set the screen saver activation time and optionally disable password protection.
expected_results: The screen saver settings are configured according to user preferences.

action: Click on the 'Power...' button to open the 'Power Options Properties' dialog box.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box opens.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Power Schemes' tab content is displayed.

action: Choose a power scheme from the dropdown menu and configure the settings for 'Turn off monitor', 'Turn off hard disks', 'System standby', and 'System hibernates'.
expected_results: The power management settings are customized according to user preferences.

precondition: The 'Power Schemes' tab is open with customized settings.
action: Click 'Apply' or 'OK' to apply the power management settings.
expected_results: The computer's power-saving behavior is customized according to the configured settings.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open on the 'Screen Saver' tab.
action: Click 'OK' to apply any changes made and close the dialog box.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' dialog box closes, and any configured settings are applied.
